About

I am an aspiring AI researcher pursuing PhD opportunities in 3D computer vision and generative AI. I completed my Master's in Artificial Intelligence for Sciences at the African Institute of Mathematical Sciences (AIMS) in Cape Town, South Africa, where my thesis focused on robust full-body 3D human pose estimation.

My research combines strong mathematical foundations with production-level coding skills in TensorFlow and PyTorch to address real-world challenges, particularly in African contexts. I am passionate about advancing work in 3D vision, generative models, and their applications in developing regions.

Research Interests

  • 3D Computer Vision
  • Generative AI Models
  • Full-Body Pose Estimation
  • Deep Learning for Computer Vision
  • Bayesian Inference & Statistical Modeling
  • AI Applications in Developing Regions
